metadata.description:
Agility ServiceNow integration with data synchronization. Automatically sync Agility projects and issues. Real-time, automatic, two-way sync. 
 Integrate Agility and ServiceNow (Snow). Integrate and synchronize issues, tasks, custom fields. Enjoy the flexibility in configuring your synchronization.
 Synchronize data between Agility and ServiceNow (Snow) (f.e. If a user creates an issue in Agility then the app creates an incident in ServiceNow). 
With this integration, you can: 
automatically sync data (comments, custom fields) between Agility and ServiceNow 
sync statuses 
sync comments (including/excluding private ones) 
synchronize issues, incidents, tickets 
specify what data are synced, and which aren't (f.e. by adding a special label) 
avoid data loss, don't waste precious time of your teams.
